message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120. What do you think?
Hey Alice, $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $105 for it. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll come down to $115. What do you think?
